Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Homan/Huron
ShortDescription: #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Franklin, Kedzie, and Chicago due to festival near Homan/Huron.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Homan, Franklin, Kedzie, Chicago, and Homan, due to festival near Homan/Huron.

Allow extra travel time.
